about_the_game:
Malevolent & Benign II

Evoking the early days of roleplaying, Expeditious Retreat Press is pleased to release Malevolent and Benign II, a new 1e monster book with 150+ new creatures and more than 75 illustrations in this product adapted from the 110-paged tome, compatible with the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game! Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jason Harp
